about_the_game:
Winter is an enchanting economic strategy game that combines a captivating 2D pixel art style with immersive gameplay. Your mission is to safeguard your forest settlement against the relentless onslaught of deranged creatures from Slavic mythology. Forge an indomitable army and construct fiery walls during the night to fend off the chilling spirit of winter. Take charge of your settlement, diligently recruiting fighters to bolster your forces before each nightfall. However, remain vigilant, for each new day presents fresh challenges and obstacles to overcome. Immerse yourself in the mesmerizing world that surrounds you, meticulously studying and exploring the lush forests as you embark on a quest for eternal spring.


Once upon a time, a child with a remarkable difference was born. Their heart burned as intensely as a dragon's breath, and their kindness shone so brightly that even the gods took notice. However, this extraordinary power came at a cost. It drove a hunter to madness, inflicting eternal sorrow upon innocent people. In an attempt to restore balance, the water deity stripped the frost of all its powers. But in turn, the frost imprisoned the child's soul within a sacred totem, rendering them capable of defeating the vengeful merman with their army. In a cruel twist, the water deity brought forth the demise of Mokosh, the god of nature and life. Yet, these mighty powers of frost were taken away, and the child of fire became subject to punishment for any misdeed. Determined to reclaim their true self, the child of fire strives to restore their powers, day after day.


  • Mythical Creatures: "Winter" immerses players in a world filled with enchanting mythical creatures from Slavic mythology. Encounter and engage with a diverse array of beings, each possessing unique abilities, strengths, and weaknesses.
  • Strategic Economic Gameplay: The game emphasizes strategic planning and resource management. Players must gather silver, build and upgrade settlements, and ensure the prosperity of their community to attract new fighters and thrive.
  • Army Development and Training: Create a formidable army capable of battling the frosty creatures and defending your settlement. Recruit fighters from neighboring settlements and train them to unleash their unique skills and abilities in combat.
  • Deep Dive into Slavic Mythology: "Winter" offers an opportunity to delve into the rich lore and history of Slavic mythology. Discover ancient secrets, unravel mysteries, and learn more about the fascinating world that surrounds you as you progress through the snowy forests.
  • Dynamic Weather Events: Weather plays a significant role in the game, with random weather events adding additional challenges. Offerings and prayers to the gods can influence the weather, providing benefits or hindrances that can impact your battle against the forces of winter. Adapt your strategies accordingly to overcome these changing conditions.
